snippet: The TimesTalks series hosted a panel discussion with several of the young American breakout stars of the 2012 Games today in London. Juliet Macur of The Times served as moderator.
abstract: The TimesTalks series hosted a panel discussion with several of the young American breakout stars of the 2012 Games today in London. Juliet Macur of The Times served as moderator.

headline.main: TimesTalks: Faces of the 2012 Summer Games
